SELECT g.gd_no , g.gd_id , g.gd_name , g.gd_hp , g.gd_major , r.reservable_date , r.reservable_hour , r.reservable_major
, (SELECT count(review) FROM review WHERE gd_no = #{gd_no}) as reviewCount
, (SELECT (sum(star)/count(star)) FROM review WHERE gd_no = #{gd_no}) as starAverage
, (SELECT count(cancel_no) FROM cancel WHERE gd_no = #{gd_no}) as cancelCount
, (SELECT (count(rsv.reserve_no)- (SELECT count(cancel_no) FROM cancel c WHERE gd_no = #{gd_no} ) ) FROM reservation rsv WHERE rsv.gd_no = #{gd_no}) as reserveCount
FROM gd g INNER JOIN ( SELECT ra.reservable_no , ra.gd_no , ra.reservable_date , ra.reservable_hour , ra.reservable_do , rm.reservable_major FROM reservable ra INNER JOIN reservableMajor rm ON ra.reservable_no = rm.reservable_no ) as r ON g.gd_no = r.gd_no
reservable_do = 0
AND (r.reservable_date BETWEEN #{dateStart} AND #{dateEnd})
AND r.reservable_major Like '%${reserveSaerch1}%'
AND g.gd_ableaddr Like '%${reserveSaerch2}%'
AND g.gd_name = #{reserveSaerch3}
ORDER BY reviewCount DESC
ORDER BY reviewCount ASC
ORDER BY starAverage DESC
ORDER BY starAverage ASC
ORDER BY cancelCount DESC
ORDER BY cancelCount ASC
ORDER BY reserveCount DESC
ORDER BY reserveCount ASC
